passive.name: REIGN OF ANGER
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) REIGN OF ANGER
                                Casting abilities with 50 Fury or more consumes that Fury for enhanced effects. Enhanced abilities do not generate any Fury.Attacks generate 5 Fury. Fury gains are increased by 50% when under 50% Health. Out of combat, 4 Fury dissipates every second.

q.name: (Q) CULL THE MEEK
q.description:
(Q) CULL THE MEEK
 7s  
                                
                                
                                Deal 80 physical damage (80/130/180/230 + 90% bonus ) to nearby enemies, generating 5 Fury and healing 10/14/18/22  + 10% bonus  per enemy unit.Reign of Anger: Damage increases to 120 physical damage (120/195/270/345 + 135% bonus ) and healing is increased by 200% (12/18/24/30 + 24% ).

w.name: (W) RUTHLESS PREDATOR
w.description:
(W) RUTHLESS PREDATOR
 13/12/11/10s  
                                
                                
                                Empowers the next attack to strike twice, stunning for 0.75 seconds and dealing 125 physical damage (20/50/80/110 + 150% ).Reign of Anger: Strikes three times, stunning for 1.5 seconds and dealing 188 physical damage (30/75/120/165 + 225% ).Under the effect of Red Fury, clear all shields on the target.

e.name: (E) SLICE AND DICE
e.description:
(E) SLICE AND DICE
 15/14/13/12s  
                                
                                
                                Dash in a direction, dealing 40 physical damage (40/80/120/160 + 90% bonus ) and generating 5 Fury for each enemy passed through. Hitting an enemy grants a second dash to cast within 4 seconds.Reign of Anger: The second dash now deals 70 physical damage (70/130/190/250 + 135% bonus ) and shreds armor by 25/30/35/40% for 4 seconds.

r.name: (R) DOMINUS
r.description:
(R) DOMINUS
 75/70/65s  
                                
                                
                                Gain 20 Fury and 300/575/850 Health for 12 seconds. Every second after casting, gain 5 Fury and deal 70 magic damage (70/120/170 + 20% ) to nearby enemies.

boots_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

runes_detailed.description: Gain tenacity for each Legend stack (max 10 stacks). Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, and minion kill.
After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal over time based on missing health.
